prf::CaContact

prf::CaContact Class Reference

A simple contact function based on Calpha separation. More...

#include <ContactFunctions.hh>

Inherits prf::ContactFunction.

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void set_cutoff (double xx)
 Set and get cutoff for C-alpha contacts.

Detailed Description

This contact function merely checks if the Calpha atoms of two residues are within a certain given distance of each other. If they are, the residues are regarded as being in contact. The default for the distance cut-off is 6.0 Angstroms. It can be changed with the function set_cutoff(double).
